purpose: Facilitate observability, monitoring, and evaluation of AI agents and multi-agent systems.
principle: Utilizes tracing, execution graph views, and timeline analytics to provide insights into agent operations and performance.
reusability: Offers a Python SDK for easy integration, self-hosted dashboard for visualization, and supports tracing of agents, LLMs, and tools.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential stability issues.
name: RagaAI-Catalyst
description: Python SDK for Agent AI Observability, Monitoring and Evaluation Framework. Includes features like agent, llm and tools tracing, debugging multi-agentic system, self-hosted dashboard and advanced analytics with timeline and execution graph view
highlight: Comprehensive observability and monitoring framework for AI agents with advanced analytics and debugging tools.
